====Usage notes====
* {{lang|zh|列車／列车}} is sometimes used instead of {{zh-l|火車}} to follow technology development as train are not steam powered anymore. But it only refers to the train itself and not the mode of transportation. It can't replace {{zh-l|火車}} in the following terms:
** {{zh-x|火車 票|train ticket}}
** {{zh-x|火車 站|train station}}
** {{zh-x|坐 火車|to travel by train}}
